product_name: SIGMA SPORT BC 12.12 Bike Computer - Wireless
long_description: The Sigma Sport BC 12. 12 Wireless Bike Computer gives you all the information you need to track your training without being confusing or distracting, so you can optimize your time on the bike.
short_description: The Sigma Sport BC 12. 12 Wireless Bike Computer gives you all the information you need to track your training without being confusing or distracting, so you can optimize your time on the bike.
